topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bb4b5363687255730b0800#post_54bb4b5363687255730b0800
A guy learns how to breath and then beats the shit out of his vampire brother.

Then the guy's grandson learns how to breath and use clackers then beats the shit outta 3 naked vampires that were glued to pillars.

Then the guys grandsons' grandson gets possesed and has to go on a journey with his now tentacle possesed grand dad, 3 other possesed dudes, and a possessed dog to beat the shit outta the vampire brother of the first guy.

It's a lot better than I make it sound.
